[PAWN_pronoun] grew to hate people slaughtering animals for luxury and profit.

BackstoryDef.title: treasure hunter
BackstoryDef.baseDesc:
[PAWN_nameDef] explored outlying rimworlds in hopes of finding rare treasures.
After succeeding in finding one legendary sculpture, [PAWN_pronoun] was betrayed by [PAWN_possessive] men. [PAWN_pronoun] survived their treasonous attack, but the sculpture was taken.
[PAWN_pronoun] created the Anvil Mercenary Company to help [PAWN_objective] seek revenge.

BackstoryDef.title: starfighter pilot
BackstoryDef.baseDesc:
After years of training and drilling, [PAWN_nameDef] finally became a starfighter pilot.
Hundreds of combat missions later, [PAWN_pronoun] grew bored and started seeking newer thrills. [PAWN_pronoun] joined a band of space pirates, which eagerly welcomed [PAWN_objective] because of [PAWN_possessive] piloting skill.

BackstoryDef.title: gang soldier
BackstoryDef.baseDesc:
Living for many years between three raider settlements, [PAWN_nameDef] persevered through many challenges: a spacecraft implosion, cryptostasis, crashlanding on a miserable dustball of a planet, and nursing an old man back to health, and many of battles.
[PAWN_pronoun] eventually took control of a violent gang.

BackstoryDef.title: space marine
BackstoryDef.baseDesc:
[PAWN_nameDef] joined Interplanetary Marines to travel the stars fight for [PAWN_possessive] planet. [PAWN_pronoun] distinguished [PAWN_objective]self in several battles.
[PAWN_possessive] experiences desensitized [PAWN_objective] to people around [PAWN_objective], and [PAWN_possessive] social skills degraded. But, [PAWN_pronoun] did learn how to fight.

BackstoryDef.title: adventurer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc:
[PAWN_nameDef]'s thirst for adventure took [PAWN_objective] to many planets. [PAWN_pronoun] visited the brightest glitterworlds and the darkest war-torn toxic planets in [PAWN_possessive] quest to find novelty and excitement.
[PAWN_pronoun] worked as little as possible, often skirting ethical boundaries to make a quick buck. Among all jobs, [PAWN_pronoun] hated cooking the most.

BackstoryDef.title: bloody wanderer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was a wanderer, traveling from town to town, taking odd jobs and stealing to live.
One day, [PAWN_pronoun] had a mental break and went on a long rampage, destroying several towns and killing many. [PAWN_pronoun] eventually calmed, but [PAWN_possessive] bloodlust never left [PAWN_objective].

BackstoryDef.title: pirate doctor
BackstoryDef.baseDesc:
[PAWN_nameDef] had a passion for medicine, but never bothered to get a medical degree. Only underfunded pirates and terrorists were desperate enough to hire [PAWN_possessive] services, and [PAWN_possessive] surgical patients had about a 50% survival rate.
Despite this, [PAWN_possessive] optimistic attitude drove [PAWN_objective] to keep trying to heal those in need. As long as they paid up front.

BackstoryDef.title: bloody dentist
BackstoryDef.baseDesc:
After studying at a famous college, [PAWN_nameDef]'s weak personality eventually snapped under the strain of angry administrators and whining patients. [PAWN_pronoun] went on a secret murder spree, killing many of those under [PAWN_possessive] care.
After a pursuit, [PAWN_pronoun] managed to escape [PAWN_possessive] planet and travel to a new world.

BackstoryDef.title: master chef
BackstoryDef.baseDesc:
On a glitterworld, [PAWN_nameDef] found a job washing dishes at a famous restaurant and worked [PAWN_possessive] way up the ranks.
A few years later, [PAWN_possessive] career came to an end when someone poisoned the meal [PAWN_pronoun] was preparing for the mayor. Jobless, [PAWN_pronoun] and left to explore the stars once again.

BackstoryDef.title: mercenary
BackstoryDef.baseDesc:
After escaping [PAWN_possessive] home planet, [PAWN_nameDef] fell in with a band of mercenaries. [PAWN_pronoun] fought alongside [PAWN_possessive] brothers and sisters in arms for many years.
One day, they were caught in a fight they couldn't win. Refusing to retreat, [PAWN_nameDef] was shot down by [PAWN_possessive] enemies. [PAWN_pronoun] was alarmed to awake in a heap of corpses, mysteriously unharmed.

BackstoryDef.title: explorer-writer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc:
[PAWN_nameDef] traveled from planet to planet, gathering samples, stories, and research.
[PAWN_possessive] goal was to bring together enough knowledge to make a survival guide for future generations.

BackstoryDef.title: militia soldier
BackstoryDef.baseDesc:
[PAWN_nameDef] joined the militia forces and fought for rights and peace.
After [PAWN_possessive] homeworld was unexpectedly destroyed in the wars, [PAWN_pronoun] traveled great distances, seeking a refuge where [PAWN_pronoun] could build a new, free way of life.

BackstoryDef.title: warship captain
BackstoryDef.baseDesc:
Years of being commanding officer of an advanced corvette taught [PAWN_nameDef] the art of leadership, the techniques of higher engineering, and how to stay calm while enemies try to kill you.
Unfortunately, [PAWN_nameDef] only very rarely had contact with nature.

BackstoryDef.title: forest prowler
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] led a band of wild men in the forest. They foraged for food, hunted, and sometimes murdered more civilized people to steal their shiny objects.

BackstoryDef.title: runaway dancer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc:
Grown by and for science, [PAWN_nameDef] gave it up. Instead, [PAWN_pronoun] wanted to dance for crowds across many worlds, from the glamor of the glitterworlds to the dangers of the rim.
Such work required wearing a smile on [PAWN_possessive] face and a pistol under [PAWN_possessive] costume.

BackstoryDef.title: prostitute idol
BackstoryDef.baseDesc:
After [PAWN_possessive] father was deposed, [PAWN_nameDef]'s beauty led [PAWN_objective] to be forced into pornography to survive.
Over years of difficult treatments, [PAWN_possessive] body was remodeled to appear temporarily ageless. Sold to an orbital brothel, [PAWN_pronoun] became popular, with a steady stream of clients from all over the planet.

BackstoryDef.title: sickly lawyer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc:
As a lawyer, [PAWN_nameDef] could convict a deaf man for stealing music. [PAWN_possessive] sharp mind and lack of empathy let [PAWN_objective] say anything to get the other person to talk. With the right amount of money, [PAWN_pronoun] knew, any case can be won.
[PAWN_possessive] childhood cough never went away.

BackstoryDef.title: tinkerer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc:
"How does this work?
Why does this move?
Maybe if I change this... oops, I hope it works better... or maybe I broke it..."

BackstoryDef.title: rocket pioneer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc:
As a self-taught engineer, [PAWN_nameDef] escaped [PAWN_possessive] dying homeworld on a rocket [PAWN_pronoun] built [PAWN_objective]self.
[PAWN_pronoun] later spent years of [PAWN_possessive] life on several worlds, helping less-developed planets develop rocket technology.

BackstoryDef.title: theater technician
BackstoryDef.baseDesc:
[PAWN_nameDef] spent countless hours behind the scenes of a famous theater. [PAWN_pronoun] built scenery, programmed lights, and monitored the machines that moved the sets.
Off duty, [PAWN_pronoun] would talk with the cast members. Navigating the social drama of the actors helped [PAWN_objective] learn how to communicate well and manipulate others.

BackstoryDef.title: army sergeant
BackstoryDef.baseDesc:
[PAWN_nameDef] served in [PAWN_possessive] country's military, commanding small units as a non-commissioned officer.
[PAWN_pronoun] excelled creating tactically sound plans despite difficult circumstances.

BackstoryDef.title: stellar pirate
BackstoryDef.baseDesc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was captain of a pirate ship. [PAWN_pronoun] and [PAWN_possessive] crew made their living capturing traders who wandered off-course.
[PAWN_pronoun] was known for [PAWN_possessive] balanced approach to problems, building, fighting, or negotiating as needed.

BackstoryDef.title: lost soldier
BackstoryDef.baseDesc:
[PAWN_nameDef]'s childhood soldier conditioning failed, and the experiment was shut down. [PAWN_pronoun] was abandoned, purposeless, friendless.
[PAWN_nameDef] eventually found solace in physically demanding work. [PAWN_pronoun] especially liked building houses and crafting heavy armor.

BackstoryDef.title: language analyst
BackstoryDef.baseDesc:
After war broke out on [PAWN_possessive] homeworld, [PAWN_nameDef] was conscripted as a linguist. [PAWN_pronoun] spent [PAWN_possessive] days in a space station, decoding enemy communications and tending the hydroponic crops.
After a meteorite damaged the station, [PAWN_pronoun] was forced to enter cryptosleep and hope for rescue.

BackstoryDef.title: prisoner of war
BackstoryDef.baseDesc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was captured and put on death row for war crimes.
Fortunately for [PAWN_objective], someone cut the power to [PAWN_possessive] cell block. Riots ignited. Guards and trained wargs were deployed to quell the uprising. Organizing a few other inmates, [PAWN_nameDef] escaped in a small spacecraft.

BackstoryDef.title: mad accountant
BackstoryDef.baseDesc:
As an accountant, [PAWN_nameDef] often socialized with colleagues, and made many friends in upper management.
One day, [PAWN_nameDef] discovered a corruption racket run by some of [PAWN_possessive] bosses. After reporting this, [PAWN_pronoun] was fired. Wishing to hunt down those responsible, [PAWN_pronoun] went on a mass murder spree.

BackstoryDef.title: politician
BackstoryDef.baseDesc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was an activist in a powerful political faction. There [PAWN_pronoun] learned the art of persuasion and speech.
[PAWN_pronoun] had many enemies, so [PAWN_pronoun] took secret courses in shooting and hand-to-hand combat.

BackstoryDef.title: philosopher
BackstoryDef.baseDesc:
[PAWN_nameDef]'s thirst for archaeo-technological knowledge drove [PAWN_objective] to spend years surveying abandoned data centers and studying ancient coding languages.
[PAWN_pronoun] claimed to be one of the few who could piece together the tragedy of the past - and offer a path to the future.

BackstoryDef.title: adventurous weirdo
BackstoryDef.baseDesc:
A creative but strange individual, [PAWN_nameDef] dedicated [PAWN_possessive] life to [PAWN_possessive] twin passions of medieval world history and high technology.
[PAWN_pronoun] was fascinated by the idea of becoming a 'skyknight' with glittering armor and a giant sword.

BackstoryDef.title: casket builder
BackstoryDef.baseDesc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was fascinated with cryptosleep, and spent [PAWN_possessive] life learning about the mysterious technology.
Working as an assembler on a midworld, [PAWN_nameDef] built an experimental prototype casket from discarded parts. Unfortunately, while [PAWN_pronoun] was searching for the final component, [PAWN_possessive] home was leveled by a bomb.

BackstoryDef.title: military officer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc:
Obsessed with interstellar travel, [PAWN_nameDef] left [PAWN_possessive] desolate life behind to join a military academy in hopes of becoming a pilot.
[PAWN_pronoun] was trained in advanced combat and survival skills. While [PAWN_pronoun] excelled in [PAWN_possessive] studies, [PAWN_nameDef] was a loner and never cared about [PAWN_possessive] crewmates.

BackstoryDef.title: fearful chef
BackstoryDef.baseDesc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was a excellent chef who worked in a high-end restaurant.
One day, [PAWN_pronoun] left the stove on, and accidentally burned down the whole building. This event shook [PAWN_objective] so much that [PAWN_pronoun] swore to never touch a stove again.

BackstoryDef.title: muffalo researcher
BackstoryDef.baseDesc:
[PAWN_nameDef] specialized in studying and manipulating the genetic code of the muffalo.
[PAWN_possessive] work left little time to develop an appreciation for the arts or other people's company.

BackstoryDef.title: artifact hunter
BackstoryDef.baseDesc:
[PAWN_nameDef] became depressed and lost interest in life. [PAWN_pronoun] travelled from planet to planet, searching for psychic artifacts amid mechanoid ruins in the hope that they would cure the pain in [PAWN_possessive] soul.
A steady trigger finger and careful planning kept [PAWN_nameDef] alive.

BackstoryDef.title: herpetologist
BackstoryDef.baseDesc:
After a terrible mining accident, [PAWN_nameDef] set off into space in search of exotic new animal species.
[PAWN_pronoun] hoped to leave [PAWN_possessive] past behind and find long-lived companions. [PAWN_pronoun] knew the pain of loss too well.

BackstoryDef.title: fugitive
BackstoryDef.baseDesc:
[PAWN_nameDef] rebelled against the corporation [PAWN_pronoun] worked for. [PAWN_pronoun] failed, and was forced [PAWN_objective] to go on the run.
[PAWN_pronoun] was always on the move, always leaving everything behind. [PAWN_pronoun] tried to gain supporters for [PAWN_possessive] cause, but failed due to [PAWN_possessive] poor social skills.

BackstoryDef.title: gun dealer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc:
[PAWN_nameDef] traded high-tech firearms between warring factions.
Over time, [PAWN_pronoun] became very skilled at conducting product demonstrations and negotiating profitable deals.

BackstoryDef.title: colony engineer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc:
The children took over the facility, and they declared independence from the corporation.
[PAWN_nameDef] had used the VR system to become a master engineer, and [PAWN_pronoun] worked diligently to prepare the colony for the corporation's inevitable return.

BackstoryDef.title: deep space surveyor
BackstoryDef.baseDesc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was a deep space surveyor. [PAWN_pronoun] studied which worlds were the most suitable for colonization.
[PAWN_possessive] expeditions were met by hostile natives, green-painted space-women, and wannabe Greek gods. Surviving many firefights, [PAWN_pronoun] learned to build rudimentary lathes and rock cannons to fend off enemies.

BackstoryDef.title: costume crafter
BackstoryDef.baseDesc:
By day, [PAWN_nameDef] was an office worker on a midworld. At night, [PAWN_pronoun] designed and built elaborate monster costumes for science fiction conventions.
[PAWN_pronoun] learned a great deal about sewing. Unfortunately this came at the cost of being able to cook anything more complex than an instant meal.

BackstoryDef.title: gunfighter
BackstoryDef.baseDesc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was a deadly shot. Peace wasn't for him. [PAWN_pronoun] found [PAWN_possessive] family among the brothers and sisters that [PAWN_pronoun] spent years fighting alongside.
After most of those close to [PAWN_objective] died, [PAWN_pronoun] once again set off to lend [PAWN_possessive] gun to those who needed it - or those who could pay.

BackstoryDef.title: renowned professor
BackstoryDef.baseDesc:
[PAWN_nameDef]'s bottomless compassion and love of knowledge drove [PAWN_objective] to a life of teaching. [PAWN_pronoun] became one of the best-known names in academia throughout the urbworld bubble.
[PAWN_possessive] holo-lectures were revered by all that watched, and the few students [PAWN_pronoun] accepted into [PAWN_possessive] seminars spoke widely of [PAWN_possessive] kindness and patience.

BackstoryDef.title: navy tech officer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc:
After repairing a fleet admiral's holoscreen with nothing but a pair of rusty pliers and scrap wire, [PAWN_nameDef] was invited to the Federation Naval Academy.
[PAWN_pronoun] received an excellent technical education and extensive firearms training, but had no interest in studying more menial skills.

BackstoryDef.title: king of pirates
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: As a self-proclaimed king of pirates, [PAWN_nameDef] was ruthless. Manipulative in nature, [PAWN_pronoun] was not afraid to sacrifice the people around [PAWN_objective] in service of [PAWN_possessive] own goals. [PAWN_pronoun] was a good shot, but even more skilled with a sword, and [PAWN_pronoun] loved the adrenaline rush of close combat.

BackstoryDef.title: space navy tech
BackstoryDef.baseDesc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was in a space navy for the most powerful planet in the local star group. [PAWN_pronoun] developed skills in maintenance, electronic systems, radar and imaging, and logistics management.
[PAWN_pronoun] served with pride and patriotic love for [PAWN_possessive] planet.

BackstoryDef.title: defector
BackstoryDef.baseDesc:
[PAWN_nameDef] decided to leave the oppressive dictatorship where [PAWN_pronoun] lived. [PAWN_possessive] defection was not well-received, and agents were sent after [PAWN_objective].
[PAWN_pronoun] spent years on the run. Since [PAWN_pronoun] could trust no doctor, [PAWN_pronoun] treated [PAWN_possessive] own wounds. The ordeal made [PAWN_objective] bitter and untrusting.

BackstoryDef.title: space marine medic
BackstoryDef.baseDesc:
[PAWN_nameDef] joined a colony contact expeditionary force as a medic. The mission turned bad when the colonists turned out to be suffering from a zombifying disease. [PAWN_pronoun] ran and fought for days.
Cornered with wounded men, [PAWN_pronoun] sprayed enough ammunition to wear out four machine gun barrels, and learned the value of high-volume fire. But [PAWN_possessive] nickname, Noob, stuck from that day forward.

BackstoryDef.title: technician
BackstoryDef.baseDesc:
As an IT technician, [PAWN_nameDef] didn't have much time to write code any more.
[PAWN_pronoun] got called to work all the time to fix failures in the cryptosleep chamber and AI persuasion systems.

BackstoryDef.title: mercenary lord
BackstoryDef.baseDesc:
[PAWN_nameDef] formed a mercenary company out of freelancers who wanted to make good money while also making slightly better-than-average moral choices. [PAWN_pronoun] called it the Ashmarines.
To avoid the coreworlds' military forces, [PAWN_pronoun] moved [PAWN_possessive] company to the rimworlds. There, [PAWN_pronoun] established bases and communities. In ruling, [PAWN_pronoun] maintained a form of order among the raiders and madmen of deep space.

BackstoryDef.title: shadow marine
BackstoryDef.baseDesc:
After perfecting [PAWN_possessive] skills as a pathfinder, [PAWN_nameDef] left [PAWN_possessive] unit to put [PAWN_possessive] skills to use on the planets [PAWN_pronoun] helped chart.
Familiar with orbital trade routes, [PAWN_pronoun] was able to get onto and off any planet without being detected.

BackstoryDef.title: warlordess
BackstoryDef.baseDesc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was the tough leader of a pirate band.
[PAWN_pronoun] would accept any challenge, no matter how violent or dangerous. Others called [PAWN_objective] a killing machine.

BackstoryDef.title: computer engineer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc:
Leveraging [PAWN_possessive] childhood experience, [PAWN_nameDef] became a computer engineer. [PAWN_pronoun] also learned to craft delicate sculptures and random electronics for fun.
[PAWN_nameDef] became fond of technology and mostly gave up on talking to people. Using computers as friends has left [PAWN_nameDef] unable to care for others.

BackstoryDef.title: commoner lord
BackstoryDef.baseDesc:
After years of training in martial arts and diplomacy, [PAWN_nameDef] was eventually given land and subjects of [PAWN_possessive] own to rule.
Because of [PAWN_nameDef]'s commoner heritage, the other lords disapproved. They framed [PAWN_objective] for a heinous crime, and the emperor had no choice but to exile [PAWN_objective].

BackstoryDef.title: tournament fighter
BackstoryDef.baseDesc:
Motivated by the violence in [PAWN_possessive] environment, [PAWN_nameDef] studied martial arts, eventually signing up for an unarmed fighting tournament.
Unlike [PAWN_possessive] opponents, [PAWN_nameDef] looked to the ancient warriors for guidance. [PAWN_pronoun] trained from dusk till dawn, perfecting [PAWN_possessive] skills.

BackstoryDef.title: hypnocult leader
BackstoryDef.baseDesc:
Desiring to understand people, [PAWN_nameDef] learned hypnotism and discovered [PAWN_possessive] talent for the art.
[PAWN_pronoun] gathered followers and formed a cult around [PAWN_possessive] vibrant personality. The authorities discovered [PAWN_possessive] illegal operations, and [PAWN_nameDef] fled before [PAWN_pronoun] could be arrested.

BackstoryDef.title: art student
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: After years of practice, Freya was able to enrol into an art university and take her skills further. She sought art industry work after graduating with good grades. She made some progress with private commissions, managing to make a decent living from heart.

BackstoryDef.title: vengeful nomad
BackstoryDef.baseDesc:
After refusing the wild demands of a tyrannical king, [PAWN_nameDef]'s nomad band was marked as an outlaw group and systematically hunted.
[PAWN_nameDef]'s family was eventually captured. Those who weren't killed were taken as slaves. Sold to the owner of a manufactory, [PAWN_nameDef] swore that one day [PAWN_pronoun] would have [PAWN_possessive] revenge.

BackstoryDef.title: mod designer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc:
[PAWN_nameDef] designed combat modifications for frontline soldiers.
One night, in a nightmare, [PAWN_nameDef] was confronted by all the men and women killed by [PAWN_possessive] work. [PAWN_pronoun] decided to travel to the rimworlds and use [PAWN_possessive] skills for good.

BackstoryDef.title: mercenary captain
BackstoryDef.baseDesc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was in the crew of a mercenary ship. Disciplined and confident, [PAWN_pronoun] quickly rose through the ranks and gained friends.
In [PAWN_possessive] time as a mercenary captain, [PAWN_pronoun] was known for being gregarious and calm - possibly thanks to the joywires.

BackstoryDef.title: restorer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] traveled the world, always looking for old and forgotten things to repair for the good of others, working to see the true beauty in all things.

BackstoryDef.title: Rimworld exile
BackstoryDef.baseDesc:
After [PAWN_possessive] planet was technologically uplifted by a benevolent glitterworld charity, [PAWN_nameDef] saw an opportunity to make some money by defrauding the wealthy glitterworld visitors.
After [PAWN_pronoun] was caught, [PAWN_pronoun] was exiled to the rim, where [PAWN_pronoun] targeted rich trading companies to continue [PAWN_possessive] life of crime.

BackstoryDef.title: Streamer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc:
[PAWN_nameDef] worked as a videogame streamer, and was known for [PAWN_possessive] monkey-related impressions and jokes.
A pandemic forced [PAWN_objective] to go into cryptosleep for several years. During [PAWN_possessive] sleep, [PAWN_pronoun] was launched on an interstellar diplomatic mission. Nothing was heard of [PAWN_objective] ever again.

BackstoryDef.title: Civil servant
BackstoryDef.baseDesc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was bureaucrat in the civil service.
Although [PAWN_possessive] family connections took [PAWN_objective] far, [PAWN_possessive] vocal opposition to [PAWN_possessive] bosses' plans hindered [PAWN_possessive] advancement. Called a "red prince" by some, [PAWN_nameDef] sympathized with the poor, leading ultimately to disgrace in [PAWN_possessive] career.

BackstoryDef.title: Traveling bard
BackstoryDef.baseDesc:
[PAWN_nameDef] joined the famous Star Pilots On Channel K (aka S.P.O.C.K) and toured the star system, but eventually the band split up and their fame faded away.
[PAWN_pronoun] ended up as a travelling bard playing on [PAWN_possessive] portable synthesizer as [PAWN_pronoun] traveled from spaceport to spaceport.

BackstoryDef.title: game developer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was an independent game developer.
After an early success, [PAWN_possessive] career quickly degenerated into a circus of misguided ideas, deals gone wrong, and desperate, failed PR stunts.
